query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and (event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.network.CreateSecurityGroup or yandex.cloud.audit.network.UpdateSecurityGroup) and not user.name: mirtov8@yandex-team.ru kirill@yandex-team.ru

attributes.title: Yandexcloud:VPC sec-group action from user not in list

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.storage.BucketAclUpdate and details.acl.grants.grant_type: "ALL_USERS"

attributes.title: Yandexcloud:ObjectStorage bacome public through ACL

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.storage.BucketUpdate and (details.objects_access: true or details.settings_read_access: true or details.list_access: true)

attributes.title: Yandexcloud:ObjectStorage become public

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.kms.DeleteSymmetricKey

attributes.title: Yandexcloud:KMS delete key
Yandexcloud: IAM sa connect from outside of cloud

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: (yandex.cloud.audit.compute.UpdateInstance or yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateInstance) and details.metadata_keys: secret key password pass token oauth aws_access_key_id and event.outcome : success

attributes.title: Yandexcloud: Compute metadata key posible secret

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.outcome : success and event.action: (yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateInstance or yandex.cloud.audit.compute.UpdateInstance) and details.metadata_serial_port_enable: 1

attributes.title: Yandexcloud:Create instance with Serialport

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.outcome : success and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateInstance and not details.network_interfaces.security_group_ids: *

attributes.title: Yandexcloud:Create instance without SG

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.network.CreateAddress and not details.external_ipv4_address.requirements.ddos_protection_provider: qrator

attributes.title: Yandexcloud:Create public address without antiddos

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and error.message: Permission denied

attributes.title: Yandexcloud: unauthorized events (permission denied)

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action:  yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateInstance and details.network_interfaces.primary_v4_address.one_to_one_nat.address: *

attributes.title: Yandexcloud:Create instances with public IP

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and event.action:  yandex.cloud.audit.compute.CreateInstance and details.network_interfaces.index: 1

attributes.title: Yandexcloud:Create instances with 2 interfaces

query.query: event.dataset: yandexcloud.audittrail and (event.action: yandex.cloud.audit.network.CreateSecurityGroup or yandex.cloud.audit.network.UpdateSecurityGroup) and details.rules.direction: INGRESS and details.rules.cidr_blocks.v4_cidr_blocks: *0.0.0.0*

attributes.title: Yandexcloud:Create dangerous 0.0.0.0 ACL:SG
